uSync.description: Configuration of uSync syncing tool for Umbraco

RootFolder.description: Location where all uSync files are saved by default

ImportAtStartup.description: Import when Umbraco boots (can be group name or 'All' so everything is done, blank or 'none' == off)

ExportOnSave.description: Export when an item is saved in Umbraco

UIEnabledGroups.description: The handler groups that are enabled in the UI.

ReportDebug.description: Debug reports (creates an export into a temp folder for comparison)

AddOnPing.description: Ping the AddOnUrl to get the json used to show the addons dashboard

FailOnMissingParent.description: fail if the items parent is not in umbraco or part of the batch being imported

ShowVersionCheckWarning.description: Show a version check warning to the user if the folder version is less than the version expected by uSync.

CustomMappings.description: Custom mapping keys, to add a simple config mapping to make one property behave like and existing one

SignalRRoot.description: Location of the SignalR hub script
